name: ComparatorUtils_chainedComparatorTest
description: Unit tests for the chainedComparator functionality in ComparatorUtils.

test_cases.name: testChainedComparatorWithValidComparators
test_cases.description: Tests the chainedComparator functionality with valid comparators.

test_cases.name: testChainedComparatorWithNullComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the chainedComparator functionality with a null comparator, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testChainedComparatorWithEmptyComparators
test_cases.description: Tests the chainedComparator functionality with an empty array of comparators.

test_cases.name: testChainedComparatorWithSingleComparator
test_cases.description: Tests the chainedComparator functionality with a single comparator.
